AT.name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow Mirror of Fate
AT.description: Was einstmals Gabriel Belmont war, ist nun ein mächtiger Vampir namens Dracula. Schließe dich seinen Ahnen, dem berühmten Belmont-Clan, an und vernichte ihn ein für alle Mal. • Intensive Peitschenkämpfe und Jump-‘n’-Run-Elemente • Episches Abenteuer mit umfangreichen Erkundungsmöglichkeiten und Herausforderungen • Decke in Draculas Schloss seine dunkelsten Geheimnisse auf!

AU.name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow Mirror of Fate
AU.description: What was once Gabriel Belmont is now a powerful vampire called Dracula. Join his descendants, the famed Belmont clan as they seek his ultimate destruction. An epic adventure with deep exploration and challenges. Featuring, intense whip combat and platforming. Explore Dracula's castle and discover its darkest secrets.

BG.name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow Mirror of Fate
BG.description: What was once Gabriel Belmont is now a powerful vampire called Dracula. Join his descendants, the famed Belmont clan as they seek his ultimate destruction. • Intense whip combat and platforming. • Huge adventure with deep exploration and challenges. • Explore Dracula's castle and discover its darkest secrets.

BE.name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow Mirror of Fate
BE.description: Celui qui fut Gabriel Belmont est désormais un puissant vampire du nom de Dracula. Rejoignez ses ancêtres, le célèbre clan Belmont, tandis qu'ils cherchent à le détruire à jamais. • Des combats de fouet et un jeu de plateforme intenses. • Une aventure épique fabuleuse remplie d'exploration et de défis. • Explorez le château de Dracula et percez ses plus sombres secrets !

ES.name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow Mirror of Fate
ES.description: Quien fue en el pasado Gabriel Belmont es hoy un poderoso vampiro llamado Drácula. Únete a sus descendientes, el famoso clan Belmont, para acabar con él de una vez por todas. • Intensas luchas con látigo y plataformas. • Enorme aventura épica repleta de lugares para explorar y desafíos. • Explora el castillo de Drácula y descubre sus oscuros secretos.

IT.name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow Mirror of Fate
IT.description: Colui che un tempo era Gabriel Belmont, ora è un potente vampiro chiamato Dracula. Unisciti ai suoi antenati, il celebre clan Belmont, nella loro missione per distruggerlo definitivamente. • Combatti con la frusta e supera ogni ostacolo. • Un’epica avventura ricca di sfide ed esplorazione. • Esplora il castello di Dracula e scopri i suoi segreti più oscuri!

NO.description: What was once Gabriel Belmont is now a powerful vampire called Dracula. Join his descendants, the famed Belmont clan as they seek his ultimate destruction. • Intense whip combat and platforming. • Huge adventure with deep exploration and challenges. • Explore Dracula's castle and discover its darkest secrets.

NL.name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow Mirror of Fate
NL.description: Wat vroeger Gabriel Belmont was, is nu een machtige vampier die Dracula heet. Sluit je aan bij zijn voorouders, de beroemde Belmont-clan die streeft naar zijn ultieme vernietiging. • Intense zweepgevechten en platformspel. • Groot episch avontuur met veel diepgang en uitdagingen. • Verken het kasteel van Dracula en ontdek zijn meest duistere geheimen!

NZ.name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow Mirror of Fate
NZ.description: What was once Gabriel Belmont is now a powerful vampire called Dracula. Join his descendants, the famed Belmont clan as they seek his ultimate destruction. An epic adventure with deep exploration and challenges. Featuring, intense whip combat and platforming. Explore Dracula's castle and discover its darkest secrets.

PL.name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow Mirror of Fate
PL.description: What was once Gabriel Belmont is now a powerful vampire called Dracula. Join his descendants, the famed Belmont clan as they seek his ultimate destruction. • Intense whip combat and platforming. • Huge adventure with deep exploration and challenges. • Explore Dracula's castle and discover its darkest secrets.

PT.name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow Mirror of Fate
PT.description: O outrora Gabriel Belmont é agora um poderoso vampiro chamado Dracula. Junta-te aos seus descendentes, o famoso clã Belmont, enquanto estes procuram a sua destruição total. • Lutas com chicote e plataformas repletas de ação. • Uma aventura épica, repleta de exploração e desafios. • Explora o castelo de Dracula e descobre os seus segredos mais obscuros.

RU.name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow Mirror of Fate
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. Тот, кого некогда звали Gabriel Belmont, превратился в могущественного вампира по имени Dracula. Присоединитесь к знаменитому клану его потомков, чтобы уничтожить чудовище. • Динамичный платформер, в котором вам предстоит истреблять зло при помощи кнута. • Огромный мир, полный приключений и испытаний. • Исследуйте замок вампира Dracula и раскройте его мрачные тайны.

SE.name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow Mirror of Fate
SE.description: What was once Gabriel Belmont is now a powerful vampire called Dracula.
